about_the_game:
This is a single-player game that simulates an MMORPG


The story takes place in the legendary realm of souls—Yusufyad
The character you play miraculously resurrects after dying in the original world. During exploration, you inadvertently find a ring that seals the goddess's powers—Ulandia. With the help of the sealed goddess, you gain the ability to manipulate souls and successfully escape from powerful enemies. As the savior, you will explore every corner of the Yusufyad continent, summon scattered hero spirits, treasures, and divine artifacts from around the world, and defeat various powerful enemies to become strong enough to face the final apocalyptic moment.



The combat system uses a triangle mode similar to World of Warcraft. Players need a tank to absorb monster attacks, a healer to maintain the safety of the team members, and multiple DPS roles. Due to the use of multiple characters, some innovations in operation have been made. In addition to rotating and zooming the view, players can also batch-select characters for operation. It has a style similar to Warcraft RPG.


As the game progresses, the number of hero spirits you can obtain will also increase. Before starting a battle, you can choose the team members to face different challenges. Of course, if you prefer single-player gameplay, you can also take a single team member into battle.



You can explore dungeons scattered throughout Yusufyad to collect better equipment. The game’s large map contains many explorable areas, each with unique content. When entering a map, you will encounter a series of event cards, which may involve battles, traps, or even lucky rewards.




Players can press the pause key at any time during combat to enter strategy mode, where you can edit the next actions for each character, such as movement, recovery, or skill usage.



Almost every dungeon has hero characters that can be awakened (one random hero per location per playthrough). Players can develop them to form a powerful hero knight squad to counter the goddess's pursuit. Each character has unique attributes and skills, so players need to make choices among the hero spirits.



Players need to use the photon system flexibly to pass levels, earn rewards, and advance the story. The game hides twelve different treasures, which can be obtained through a series of puzzle levels. Having them will make your battles much more effective.



The goddess power system can save you in critical situations and significantly boost combat strength for a short period. Players can upgrade goddess talents by collecting soul fragments, making the goddess's power stronger.



Defeating different bosses may drop runes, and special rune combinations can produce hidden attributes.


Each dungeon hides divine artifacts that, once collected, can be used in other dungeons to apply buffs to your team and debuffs to enemy teams.



If you're tired of battling, you can play card games with NPCs in the city or go fishing in different scenes.




If the team has no recovery items, you can try cooking food to restore the characters' health and magic.



Powerful weapons in the game can be obtained through forging. Materials required for forging need to be acquired by exploring dungeons or mining various ores.



The game also includes a complete development system. Players can match their own playstyles and battle roles. Additionally, subsystems for equipment refining, enchantment, skill upgrading, and potion making will be unlocked as the story progresses.

This is a single-player game that simulates an MMORPG


The story takes place in the legendary realm of souls—Yusufyad

name: Chaos Entropy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U (4 * 1800) or equivalent; AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 ( 2048 MB); Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent; AMD FX-8350 (8 * 4700) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 ( 2048 MB); Radeon RX 580 (8192 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: This RPG features a unique combat system! After obtaining the Chaos God's Ring, you must evade the Goddess's minions while exploring the world, collecting divine weapons, and awakening heroic spirits. Assemble a knightly order to battle powerful enemies and uncover the ancient secrets of Eusayard.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
